channel.title: Home Page on Ventus Docs
channel.description: Recent content in Home Page on Ventus Docs

item.title: Account
item.description: On this page, you can find an explanation of how to create and manage a new user account in Cloud Console. Table of contents Registration Manage Account Edit Account Change password Set authenticator Find all sessions Login and Logout Registration To start work in the Cloud Console, firstly, you need to register a new account, for this do the following: follow the Authorization page of the Cloud Console - console.

item.title: K8S Cluster
item.description: On this page, you can find an explanation of how to create, resize, delete Kubernetes Cluster and instructions for other steps to manage a Kubernetes Cluster in the Cloud Console. Table of contents

item.title: Object Storage
item.description: On this page, you can find an explanation of what is the Object Storage in the Cloud Console, how to create, delete and instructions for other steps to manage an Object Storage credentials in the Cloud Console. Table of contents

item.title: Virtual Machines
item.description: On this page, you can find an explanation of how to create, resize, delete Linux and Windows Virtual Machine, and instructions for other steps to manage Virtual Machines in the Cloud Console. Table of contents Virtual Machines Page Create Linux Virtual Machine Create Windows Virtual Machine Download RDP File Edit a Virtual Machine Resize a Virtual Machine Delete a Virtual Machine Virtual Machine details page Virtual Machines page To get to the Virtual Machines page you need to select the Virtual Machines from the VIRTUAL DATACENTER block in the side-bar menu.

item.title: Access K8S Cluster
item.description: On this page, you can find an explanation of several ways how to access a Kubernetes Cluster created in the Cloud Console Table of contents

item.title: Connect to Linux VM
item.description: On this page, you can find an explanation of how to connect to the Linux Virual Machine created in the Cloud Console using SSH Protocol Table of contents

item.title: Firewalls
item.description: On this page, you can find an explanation of how to create, edit and delete Firewalls in the Cloud Console. Table of contents

item.title: Networks
item.description: On this page, you can find an explanation of how to create, edit and delete Networks in the Cloud Console. Table of contents

item.title: Organizations
item.description: On this page, you can find an explanation of how to create a new Organization and how to manage it in the Cloud Console. Table of contents Organizations page Create Organization Edit Organization Delete Organization Organizations page If you are a new user and have just created new account you will be automatically redirected to the Organizations page where you can create your first Organization or find a list of Organizations to which Projects your User has access as a Member:

item.title: Administrators
item.description: On this page, you can find an explanation of how to add a new Administrator to the Organization, how to Transfer the Organization to another User and how to Remove Administrator from the Organization in the Cloud Console. Table of contents Administrators page Add Administrator to the Organization Resend Invitation Delete Invitation Transfer Organization Remove Administrator from the Organization Administrators page NOTE: To see information about Administrators of the Organization and to manage them you can only if your User Role in this Organization is an Administrator or Owner.

item.title: Connect to Windows VM
item.description: On this page, you can find an explanation of how to connect to the Windows Virtual Machine created in the Cloud Console using Remote Desktop Protocol Table of contents

item.title: Firewall Rules
item.description: On this page, you can find an explanation of how to create, delete Firewall Rules and instructions for other steps to manage Firewall Rules in the Cloud Console. Table of contents

item.title: Subnets
item.description: On this page, you can find an explanation of how to create, edit and delete Subnets in the Cloud Console. Table of contents

item.title: Projects
item.description: On this page, you can find an explanation of how to create a new Project, and how to manage it in the Cloud Console. Table of contents Projects page Create Project Edit Project Delete Project Add Users to Project Projects page NOTE To see information about Projects of the Organization and to manage them you can only if your User Role in this Organization is an Administrator or Owner.

item.title: Volumes
item.description: On this page, you can find an explanation of how to create, edit, delete Volumes and instructions for other steps to manage Volumes in the Cloud Console. Table of contents

item.title: Groups
item.description: On this page, you can find an explanation of how to create and manage a new Group in the Cloud Console. Table of contents Group page Create Group Сonfigure Group Manage Users in Group Manage Projects in Group Edit Group Delete Group Groups page NOTE: Using Groups in Cloud Console you can add additional Users to the Project. To get to the Group page you need to select the Groups from the side-bar menu.

item.title: Snapshots
item.description: On this page, you can find an explanation of how to create, edit and delete Snapshots in the Cloud Console. Table of contents

item.title: SSH Keys
item.description: On this page, you can find an explanation of how to create, delete SSH Keys and instructions for other steps to manage SSH Keys in the Cloud Console. Table of contents

item.title: CLI Users
item.description: On this page, you can find an explanation of how to create, edit, delete CLI Users and instructions for other steps to manage CLI Users in the Cloud Console. Table of contents

item.title: Custom images
item.description: On this page, you can find an explanation of how to create and delete custom images in the Cloud Console. Table of contents
